10 Github 10.1 Recovering files deleted in error

10 Github 10.1 Recovering files deleted in error If you’ve deleted some files and done a commit for the deletion, you can recover them this way: Look at the commit and get its SHA In a terminal, do git checkout sha^ file_name sha is the SHA of the commit - remember to put a “^” after it! if you’re running the git command from the project’s home directory, the file name needs an extension and a path (e.g. if you’re in the home directory and run the git command and the file was deleted from a sub-directory, then do something like git sha^ docs/filename). That should restore the file to the directory it was deleted from.
